Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 6 Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga » 6.2 Abhidhammabhājanīya » 6.2.14 Akusalamūlakavipākaniddesa
6.2.14.1 Cakkhuviññāṇacitta
Paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅga
Abhidhammabhājanīya
Akusalamūlakavipākaniddesa
Cakkhuviññāṇacitta
350.
1318Katame dhammā abyākatā? Yasmiṃ samaye akusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
351.
1319Tattha katamo akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro? Yā cetanā sañcetanā sañcetayitattaṃ—  ayaṃ vuccati “akusalamūlapaccayā saṅkhāro” …pe…  tena vuccati “evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti.
<< 6.2.14 Akusalamūlakavipākaniddesaup6.2.14.2 Sotaviññāṇa-sampaṭicchanacitta >>
